tool_description: Calculates travel distances and times between technician locations and work order sites, considering traffic and route optimization.
error_messages: Invalid location: One or more locations cannot be geocoded
Routing service error: Unable to calculate distances due to service unavailability
Distance exceeds maximum: All calculated distances exceed max_distance parameter
usage: Provide technician locations and work order destination to get travel metrics. Set travel_time for accurate traffic-based estimates.

distances.description: Distances in miles for each origin location

travel_times.description: Travel times in minutes for each origin location
